article: In California, there lives a pretty girl called Donna Green. She is  _  18-year-old girl with big eyes and golden hair. She is good at singing and  has won  the first place in the Singing Competition three times. However, She became very weak two years ago. She had an unhealthy heart. "Donna needs a new heart,  _  she will die soon," the doctor said. Jim Smith,  _  was worried about Donna, was her best friend. He liked her very much and didn't want her  to die  . Jim talked to his mother about Donna. "If I am going to die, I  will gave  my heart to Donna." Jim's mother didn't pay much attention to him. She thought, "Jim is strong and healthy. He is still young." But Jim was not healthy at all. He  sometimes  had terrible headaches. One morning, he woke up  _  a sharp pain in his head and  couldn't  breathe. The Smiths rushed Jim to the hospital, but the doctor couldn't save him. The Smiths were heart-broken. Yet they remembered Jim's words. Jim wanted to give his heart to Donna! After several tests, Jim's heart  was taken  out and put into Donna's chest. In a short time, the heart began to beat. The operation was a success. Now, Donna can sing again. She is thankful to Jim for the great gift.
